fastPow

public static final float fastPow(float a,
                                  float b)
Computes a fast approximation to Math.pow(a, b). Adapted from http://www.dctsystems.co.uk/Software/power.html.

Parameters:
a - a positive number
b - a number
Returns:
a^b
